name: VR Nursing Training
description:
University of Tulsa - 2021 TURC Project

Title: VR Nursing Training Simulator
Platform: PC
Genre:  Educational / Training / Life Simulation
Rating: E
Target Market: Nursing/Medical students
Game Overview: 

A VR Nursing Training Simulation. The simulation follows the same procedures of real simulations and their tasks while only requiring correct steps and coarse accuracy of movements. The simulation can analyze mistakes in step order or rough precision of their actions.

This is a research project developed by Computer Simulation and Gaming (CSG) students in the Tandy School of Computer Science at the University of Tulsa.

Student Research Team 

  • Logan Patrick  - Project Lead / 3d Modeler 
  • Kianna Jansma - Developer
  • Addison Stewart - Project Manager 
  • Jacob Sharp - Developer 
  • Brennan Crowder - Devloper
  • Akram Taghavi-Burris - Instructor/Scrum Master

DEVELOPMENT INFORMATION For more information on the development and production of the game visit https://github.com/csg-utulsa/VR-Nursing-Training/wiki
